This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Property column-rule value '10px'
  assert_equals: expected "10px rgb(0, 255, 0)" but got "0px rgb(0, 255, 0)"
[FAIL] Property column-rule value 'medium hidden currentcolor'
  assert_equals: expected "3px hidden rgb(0, 255, 0)" but got "0px hidden rgb(0, 255, 0)"
